title: Fix template variables in pass-job-outputs.md
author: ab
details: Fixed GitHub Actions template syntax escaping in documentation examples.
Wrapped `${{ ... }}` expressions with `{% raw %}` tags to prevent unintended Liquid templating during Jekyll processing.
Applied changes to both job output definitions and environment variable usage examples.
summary:

- Applied changes to both job output definitions and environment variable usage examples.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed GitHub Actions template syntax escaping in documentation examples.
- Wrapped `${{ ... }}` expressions with `{% raw %}` tags to prevent unintended Liquid templating during Jekyll processing.
- Applied changes to both job output definitions and environment variable usage examples.

### Title
Escape Liquid syntax in Actions workflow examples
